description: Default classification weights for device type scoring in sweep_analyzer.py

notes.memristive: Scores for devices showing hysteresis, pinched loops, and switching behavior
notes.capacitive: Scores for devices with unpinched hysteresis, phase shift, and elliptical patterns
notes.memcapacitive: Scores for devices combining capacitive and memristive characteristics
notes.conductive: Scores for non-linear devices without hysteresis (non-ohmic, non-memristive)
notes.penalties: Negative scores to prevent misclassification (e.g., linear devices as memristive)
